title: #240: Profiling Bill Cosby, Part 5
description:
We continue our analysis and discussion with award winning investigative journalist Nicki Weisensee Egan and host and author of Chasing Cosby.


We deep dive the tactics used by Thomas Mesereau, Cosby's lawyer in the retrial and the lawyer responsible for Michael Jackson's acquittal, drug assisted sexual assault, language, the alarming rape conviction statistics, "Poor Me Syndrome" and "the legacy" vs convicted sex offender and rapist debate.


#VictimsMatter

#SerialPerpetrators

#ChasingCosby

#WomenMatter
